channel.title: Please help me with this!
channel.description: Hey all When my friend goes onto my server,he walks,then his client just closes. Please,please help me fix this it would be realli realli helpfull My server is a 317 delta,it was originally combatscape source

item.title: Please help me with this!

My server is a 317 delta,it was originally combatscape source[/quote]

if you start you’r client whit *.Cmd or thing like that just convert it to a *.exe whit a converter
iHope it’s will help you ;D.

item.title: Please help me with this!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

hey dude that worked
THanks so so much!!
Just outta interest what is it the same with vista
And does anyone know how to make cutscenes on delta?
Just wondering
Feel free to go onto my server anytime i will make u mod because you greatly helped me thanks
Pasta186

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me with this!
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hey
I guess he’s using windows 7 huh?

Try this (tell him to put this in his run command located in the client)

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

If that doesn’t work tell him to google bat2exe and download that, then change run.bat to run.exe.

Read full topic
